title: Rainy night city driving, almost stopped at intersection.
caption: A car drives slowly through a city intersection at night, with rain on the windshield.

reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving slowly through the intersection because of the rain and the presence of other vehicles and pedestrians. It is important to maintain a safe distance from the car in front and to be prepared to stop or change direction if necessary. The rain reduces visibility and increases braking distance, so the driver must be cautious and attentive to avoid accidents.
